institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: National Human Resources Development Consortium Operating Rules/Article 6-2 (Exclusion of Deliberation Committee Members, etc.)
contents: Article 6-2 (Exclusion of members of the Deliberation Committee, etc.) ① If a member of the Deliberation Committee falls under any of the following items, the Chairman of the Board of Directors shall exclude the member from being a member of the Deliberation Committee. Revised on June 28, 2022, 1. If the deliberation member has worked or is working at a joint training center within the last three years, 2. If the deliberation member participates or plans to participate as a steering committee member or instructor of the joint training center, 3. If the deliberation committee member is or was a relative of an executive or employee of the joint training center under Article 777 of the Civil Act; 4. If he or she has performed services, advice, research, etc. requested by the joint training center within the past three years; 5. The member concerned within the past three years 6. Any other person who is judged to be unable to conduct a fair deliberation. ② If there are circumstances that make it difficult to expect a fair deliberation from a member of the deliberation committee, the Joint Training Center may apply for recusal from the Corporation. ③ If a member of the deliberation committee falls under any of the reasons in paragraph (1) or (2), he or she must voluntarily withdraw from deliberation and resolution with the approval of the chairperson. Revised 2019. 12. 26
